website_summaries.verdict: More than enough power and cutting-edge surround sound features. It even works as a Sonos device. This is the amplifier to get for the absolute best Pioneer has to offer in home theater.
pros: Supports 7.2.2 Dolby Atmos speaker configuration and can be upgraded to 7.2.4 with an additional amplifier
Supports multiple zones and works with Sonos devices for flawless multi-room audio
Everything from music to TV sounds incredible
cons: The button layout on the included remote is a little confusing
It can run hot if you leave it on for hours at a time

customer_reviews.title: I No Longer Miss My Nakamichi
customer_reviews.text: The power and sound quality for $1000 are excellent. Though advertised as USB input capable it's not and never was. I called Pioneer Tech support and we adjusted some settings and now I like wireless sound better than wired!
customer_reviews.author: Bamafan

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with iControlAV5
customer_reviews.text: If you love the iControlAV5 android app, well, no luck here. This receiver only works with the Pioneer Remote App which is stupid compared to iControlAV5. Hope someone develops a hack or Pioneer comes out with a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: Harold

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic receiver with great sound
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a Harman Kardon AVR354, and feels better to me in every way. I'm using it in 5.1 configuration with a Zone 2 wired in. I love the ease of turning on Zone 2 with the remote or my Harmony app. I was looking for something with Chromecast built in, but I never use it because the built-in apps for Spotify, Pandora, and TuneIn Radio satisfy my needs. It integrates well with the ARC/HDMI control from my LG TV, responding quickly and consistently to turn on the correct input for watching TV, and sound is a significant upgrade from the HK. I'm looking forward to getting some Atmos speakers in the future to experience that!
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing receiver. I am thoroughly impressed with the product ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing receiver. I am thoroughly impressed with the product and it's feature capabilities. I came from an older receiver so I cannot say how it compares to some of the other current product offerings however it fills all the needs I have: Dolby Atmos support with up to 4 height speakers (my current config is 5.1.4) Room 2 support 4K support Plenty of power to drive all the speakers The only downfall at this time is it is does not support Alexa commands but I am hoping for future firmware upgrade that can enable this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this receiver now while quantities are available.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time with the competition. This unit covers it all. The inerface is very intuitive and user friendly. The sound quality is phenomenal. I'm only saying this because I purchased this along with the highest end marantz from best buy and needless to say I returned marantz and purchased a second one for my family room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: most bang for the buck - literally
customer_reviews.text: $ for $ this has to be the best receiver available right now - full 7.2.4 atmos support (w/external 2 channel mini amp for $70) I've only had for a week but I am impressed with this unit for less then $500 - I've seen units for 3-4 times as much that don't offer the quality or features of this unit - for less then $1,000 including 11 speakers and 2 subs I have a sound system that I love and the neighbors hate - thanks pioneer and amazon for making this possible
customer_reviews.author: serenity.now

customer_reviews.title: Really loving this receiver
customer_reviews.text: Got this unit hooked up and so far it's great. Sound is great, much better than my previous Onkyo. I an actually hear the voices and not just all the extra stuff going on in the movies. All the extra stuff does sound great though and spot on. I found it really easy to set up and hope to have many many years of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: SJHANKS

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Setup
customer_reviews.text: The Pioneer Elite LX503 replaced a 10 year old Pioneer Elite unit that finally died. Set up was easy, there are sufficient HDMI input ports to handle all new devices, as well as the older inputs for several old devices we still use. Sound quality is great, but I have only a 5.1 system setup so I cannot comment on the larger 7.2 or more sound systems that this unit can handle. May have been overkill for my setup, but the quality experience I had with the old Elite unit made me go with this over some of the other similar offerings.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer outstanding so far.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2 weeks ago so far not an issue. The sound and picture so far have been totally solid. Everything upcoverts. Older movies up converted to 4k. Plus I am running 5.1.4 Atmos system. I have done the full Mcacc Eq. I have owned several Pioneer receivers. This has been the best pioneer I have owned up to now. I have Samsung uhd/4k player. I am also running an Apple 4k. Plus dish network is my cable set up. Sound and picture are awesome. Plus you can not beat the price for what you get. I would tell anyone to go out and buy this.
customer_reviews.author: stephen marchesini

customer_reviews.title: Kick-ass Receiver!
customer_reviews.text: This baby is the power behind my home theater! Excellent sound, excellent video! Thank you Pioneer! I hope it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Marooned

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver!
customer_reviews.text: I have had many amps/receivers, harmon/kardon, onkyo(COMPLETE JUNK), Kenwood, Crown on and on. This receiver has the same sound characteristics of my old harmon/kardon avr7000, warm full pure. Love this receiver! Remote is idiot proof! The app takes a little learning but still great! The speakers its pushing are some klipsch reference series: 2 ceiling mount, 2 rb2 bookshelfs and its matching center.
customer_reviews.author: THE MINISTA

customer_reviews.title: HDMI handshake issues with smartv
customer_reviews.text: After connect it to a Sony Smartv, gone crazy. Some commands pass via HDMI to TV and vice versa, but no audio and video pass. Also, no audio from HDMI sources go to the speakers pluged on the receiver. All analogic functions work just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Laranjeiras

customer_reviews.title: Happy and loud!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start my Atmos system along with Klipsch RP series speakers. Yes...it’s 9.2 however, it has pre-outs to give you the ability to get to 11.2! Sign me up! Someday, if the wife lets me I will get there. But for now...I upgraded the experience! Family and friends are impressed!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: So far the only bad thing I can say is that the picture doesn't look great while watching a 4K Blu-ray that has HDR with the Xbox One, but that might be the HDMI cable the Xbox came with. I'll revisit this later when I replace it. *Edit* I replaced the HDMI cable and am still having the same issue, but it appears to be a tv issue I think. Don't know why, but I'm sure it is.
customer_reviews.author: John Sacrey

customer_reviews.title: Good Premium Receiver
customer_reviews.text: This receiver has many premium features with a quality build. Easy to use and set up. Very good value for the money. Have had this unit for 6 weeks and no issues what so ever. FS
customer_reviews.author: Frank S

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 64 years and have been buying Pioneer amps since the 6th grade when the company was Craig/Pioneer. Their amps and receivers are always of good quality and last a long time. I have an old amp that is 44 years old and still use it daily. I currently have seven Pioneer amps in my home and am happy with all of them.
customer_reviews.author: meteu399

customer_reviews.title: Pretty slick unit!
customer_reviews.text: More than I need probably, but perfect in concert with the new flat screen. Very simple to hook up and plenty of features to expand speakerwise...
customer_reviews.author: J J.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup -- sounds awesome
customer_reviews.text: I paired this receiver with Klipsch 5.1 surround sound speakers and am very impressed. The sound is clear and crisp and the bass is powerful. Like having a dance club in your house. We use YouTube music on our iPhones and simply push the Chromecast symbol to connect to the receiver -- very simple. I'll eventually add more speakers but for now very happy.
customer_reviews.author: DMZWen

customer_reviews.title: Can't judge anything
customer_reviews.text: Since the receiver won't transmit any signal to my TV. Will spend time on the phone with support this Saturday to figure out what the heck is going on. Note that my devices do work (and they worked as of Sunday night...). It's annoying as heck.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The sound was great but lowered picture quality . It did not play well with my Samsung Q8fn tv. It did not want to recognize the devices such as blu-ray player etc. Broke my heart cause I am a Pioneer fan for more years than I care to mention.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: 9.2? Yes please
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. It knocked my curtains off my window twice. Just add klipsch r12 and some elac front and center. Maybe a little Polk audio ow3. Sprinkle in ofc 12ga wire. My neighbors do not like it as much as I do. This is one Bad dude
customer_reviews.author: MW osu

customer_reviews.title: hated everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this receiver hoping it would give me the feel of my vintage receivers i have by pioneer, but i was mistaken, everything about it felt cheap, i will stick with my yamaha's for my surround sounds and use my vintage pioneers for music and entertainment, I hope pioneer get a better design because even the volume control on the receiver felt like a kids toy in your hand, and the setup for your speakers were terrible, the Yamaha manual setup surpass yours and my receiver is 4 years old
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Boone

customer_reviews.title: Supports 7.2.4 Dolby Atmos and HDCP 2.2
customer_reviews.text: This is a great receiver and the Dolby Atmos effect is amazing. I have a total of 11 speakers and I've setup 7.2.4 audio. Using the pionner remote app in my ipad to control the receiver and other devices connected to it via HDMI. I'm using Apple TV 4k and Netflix Premium subscription to get 4K UHD and Dolby Atmos programmes. Been a week since I started using it and it is pretty easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: BHARATH SRINIVASAN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for price-point
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. A lot of power for the price compared to other options in the same price category. I’ve only owned it for a short while, so I’ll update if anything goes wrong. So far I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: After coming from a 7.2 sound bar this is heaven. Clean audio, real surround locations. High fidelity. Kind of amazing computerized management. Definitely a value at this years close out prices.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: Hdmi and arc pass-through issues.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for dolby atmos. It is so fickle with hdmi cables. At first I couldn't get my ps4 pro to pass-through 4k content. Replaced with some better cords and it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: russell J thruston

customer_reviews.title: Receiver stopped working no support provided
customer_reviews.text: This amp was bought 6 months ago. Last week the amp suddenly stops working and goes into a safe mode. It will not stay on, automatically shuts off. Called customer service but they were no help. This unit is like new and is hardly used. Check connections in back and were all good. Removed all speaker wires and tried again but still no help. Pioneer please help me as this is an expensive receiver and this should not be happening!
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Muscle Cars

customer_reviews.title: I want this receiver..i just want it new..this was used..obviously
customer_reviews.text: Same issue i had with my integra..onkyo receiver..the hdmi board is broke.. i get sound but no picture.. this unit is used as well.. rhe receiver comes with all listed features on a sticker covering the elite label.. this one didn't have the sticker or a manuel.. some of the package looked like cheap zip lock bags.. plus try he box it came in was damaged .i have a few pics to prove it.. Pioneer should've never sold to onkyo..
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer VSX-LX503 9.2 Channel 4k UltraHD Network A/V Receiver
customer_reviews.text: Have had this receiver about a month now and the sound quality is excellent. The remote is easy to use and the built in Bluetooth capability allows me to utilize a number of devices. I’d recommend this receiver to anyone looking to improve their home theatre and music system.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: High quality, but slightly complicated.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine on it so far, but still a lot to learn on its bells and whistles. Only got it a few weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Virgil

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it, fantastic!! The sounds that are produced are incredible. Glad I did my research. I know there’s more for me to learn, it’s my first purchase of a quality receiver. I’m really enjoying all the options!!
customer_reviews.author: jas

customer_reviews.title: Overall Pioneer Excellence
customer_reviews.text: Many features to like about this unit. Easy setup is among the best. Downside is it doesn't come with a manual, you have to print one or use the .pdf file. At least some manual settings aren't remembered and have to be reset each session. This unit replaces my old Pioneer home theater receiver purchased in 1984.
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Sound Quality.
customer_reviews.text: Better sound than Denon 4300h for me. But remote and UI is sucks. Just good sound quality and good price for 7.2.4 atmos sound system.
customer_reviews.author: echowave

customer_reviews.title: Nice work Pioneer
customer_reviews.text: Great receiver. Great Amazon price can't go wrong. All the modern goodies. This replaced a Marantz receiver that had given me more than 7 years good service so I am used to quality sound. Pioneer is easy for this senior to set up and enjoy. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John McFadden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Completely amazed at the quality of this receiver. Sound is phenomenal and set up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Dickey

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Customer support to this point has been horrible, Amazon has referred me to pioneer, Pioneer has given me the run around. call her, call there, no customer service phone number given.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Tavares

customer_reviews.title: Good performance for the  price
customer_reviews.text: I use this primarily for video, and occasional background music. Easy setup and solid performance at a reasonable price point.
customer_reviews.author: Davd Biggs

customer_reviews.title: Receiver quality
customer_reviews.text: When connected to the mains, smoke came from the left side.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Not enough juice for my liking.
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other pioneer elite receivers that I've owned, this is lacking power.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this system. It is all that I hoped for!!
customer_reviews.author: michael smith

customer_reviews.title: Affordable yet powerful AVR
customer_reviews.text: You won't be disappointed with what it has to offer specially at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best home theater I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good system for home theater!! I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Keith

product_meta.title: Pioneer VSX-LX503 9.2 Channel 4k UltraHD Network A/V Receiver Black
product_meta.description: The Elite VSX-LX503 brings you the synergy of Dolby Atmos/DTS: x ideally calibrated by MCCAC, and the latest video standards Ultra HD/HDR10/HLG/Dolby vision, and even expands to a 7.2.4CH surround system with an external amplifier. Flare connect offers wireless multi-room audio with easy control on the Pioneer remote app, while internet radio and network streaming services can be enjoyed with chrome cast built-in and DTS Play-Fi via your smartphone. Powered zone 3 offers support for various home theater environments.
feature_bullets: Direct energy amplification at 120W Channel (8 ohms, 20 Hz-20 kHz, THD 0.08 %, 2Ch Driven, FTC)/ 230 W/Ch. (6 ohms, 1 kHz, THD 10 %, 1Ch Driven)
Supports 5.2.4 and 7.2.2-Ch speaker layouts and 7.2.4 with the addition of an external 2 Ch. amplifier for immersive Dolby Atmos & DTS: x soundtracks

Your Pioneer receiver can now be part of your existing Sonos Home Sound System, or the start of a new one. Instantly upgrade the music streaming capability of your home theater receiver with Sonos Connect and a free firmware update.
4K Ultra HD pass-through with HDCP 2.2, Dolby vision compatible with HDR10, HLG and BT.2020 support (4K/60p/4: 4: 4/24-bit) and 1080p to 4K upscaling

Powered zone 3/Zone2 allows you to experience legendary ELITE Audio quality in secondary locations such as a home office or Patio. Bluetooth Wireless Technology (Version: 4.1 + LE, Profile: A2DP 1.2/AVRCP 1.3, Codec: SBC/AAC) Built-in
Elite's MCCAC Auto room Tuning featuring phase control, subwoofer EQ and multi-point standing wave control ensures the Premier home theater calibration

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars159 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
